title: "References, Annexes, and Additional Materials"
---
Many of the courses will require knowledge of basic data science and World Bank operations. This landing page is meant as a resource for all the courses for those basic steps and processes.

## Other training courses
- The Data Academy maintains a [catalog of free MOOCs and online courses](https://worldbankgroup.sharepoint.com/sites/dtl/SitePages/PublishingPages/Free%20Data%20Online%20Courses.aspx).  
- The World Bank's Open Learning Campus has a [catalog of courses](https://olc.worldbank.org/catalog) that may be relevant to geospatial data science.  
- We have access to huge catalog of [training courses from ESRI](https://www.esri.com/training/catalog/search/) through our enterprise license. Contact the GeoLab for more information.
